constituent: furthermore, waver, pack of wild dogs, chieftain, Molotov cocktail, animal horns, whiskey bottle
heisigStory: Wild dogs . . . animal horns . . . whiskey bottle.
koohiiStory1: The waver for this kanji means to hesitate. I wavered before going into the bar with a bunch of horned wild dogs drinking whiskey straight out of the bottle.
koohiiStory2: I wavered when the pack of wild dogs was blocking the way, but then I drank some Red Bull and charged through. (thanks shakkun).
